official_title: Resolves, that Mr. Metzenbaum of Ohio be, and he is hereby, assigned to service on the Committee on Aeronautical and Space Sciences and the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, to fill vacancies on those committees.

summary.text: Assigns Mr. Metzenbaum of Ohio to service on the Senate Committee on Aeronautical and Space Sciences and the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, to fill vacancies on those committees. Assigns Mr. Taft of Ohio to service on the Committee on Armed Services, to fill a vacancy on that Committee, and directs that he be relieved of his service on the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

titles.title: Resolves, that Mr. Metzenbaum of Ohio be, and he is hereby, assigned to service on the Committee on Aeronautical and Space Sciences and the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, to fill vacancies on those committees.
